instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
In case of mildew infestation, treat with a bleach solution (1:3, laundry bleach to water, respectively) by swabbing or brushing. To ensure proper treatment, let stand for 24 hours before cleaning off residue. Let dry.
Surface to be repainted should be clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dust and dirt, and all possible contaminants.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Primer (for resulting bare substrate): BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ B‑701 or BOYSEN®® EcoPrimer™ B‑105 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Roofgard™
